author: Special Correspondent
text:
A District Committee on Redressal of Public Grievances has been constituted to redress the grievances/complaints of persons if any about the conduct of the Flying Squads or Static Surveillance Teams, Police Personnel and to release the seized cash/articles on suspicion, where it is found that the seized cash/articles are not linked with any candidate or political party or any election campaign.

The committee, constituted for the ensuing general elections to the Puducherry Legislative Assembly Constituency 2016, consists of Deputy District Election Officer at the office of the District Election Officer, Puducherry, Nodal Officer (EEM) in the office of the District Election Officer, Puducherry, and the Treasury Officer, Directorate of Accounts and Treasuries, Puducherry. For grievances/complaints contact these numbers: 0413 – 2231217 or District Control Room 0413-1950.
title: District redressal committee formed
